Translations.Text: jis Allah ne aap par Qur’aan naazil farmaya hai, wo aap ko dobaara pehli jageh laane waala hai, keh dijiye ke mera rab ose bhi ba-qoobi jaanta hai, jo hidaayath laaya hai aur ose bhi jo khuli gumraahi mein hai
aap ko to kabhi us ka qayaal bhi na guzra tha ke aap ki taraf kitaab naazil farmaayi jayegi, lekin ye aap ke rab ki meherbaani se utra, ab aap ko hargiz kaafiro ka madadgaar na hona chahiye
qayaal rakhiye ke ye kuffaar aap ko Allah ta’ala ki aayato ki tableegh se rok na de, us ke baadh ke ye aap ki jaanib utaari gayi, to apne rab ki taraf bulaate rahe aur shirk karne waalo mein se na ho

Allah ta’ala ke saath kisi aur maboodh ko na pukaarna, bajuz Allah ta’ala ke koyi aur maboodh nahi, har cheez fanaah hone waali hai magar osi ka muh (aur zaath) osi ke liye farma-ravaayi hai aur tum osi ki traf lautaaye jaoge
kya logo ne ye gumaan kar rakha hai un ke sirf is daawe par ke hum imaan laaye hai, hum unhe baghair azmaaye hoye hee chohd denge
un se aglo ko bhi hum ne qoob jaancha, yaqinan Allah ta’ala unhe bhi jaan lega, jo sach kehte hai aur unhe bhi maloom kar lega jo jhote hai
kya jo log buraiyya kar rahe hai, unhone ye samajh rakha hai ke wo hamaare qaabo se baaher ho jayenge, ye log kaisi buri tajweeze kar rahe hai
jise Allah ki mulaqaath ki ummid ho, pas Allah ka tehraya hoa waqt yaqinan aane wala hai, wo sab kuch sunne wala sab kuch jaanne wala hai
aur har ek koshish karne wala apne hee bhale ki koshish karta hai, waise to Allah ta’ala tamaam jahaan waalo se be niyaaz hai
